content: Basketball team in Singapore **Adroit Sports Association**, also known simply as **Adroit** or **Singapore Adroit**, is a semi-professional [basketball](/wiki/Basketball) team in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The team plays in the [National Basketball League](/wiki/National_Basketball_League_(Singapore)) since 2013, and has won the championship in 2014, 2023 & 2024. They won the 2023 title after defeating the Hornets in the final, and as such Adroit represented the country in the [2024 Basketball Champions League Asia qualifying rounds](/wiki/2024_Basketball_Champions_League_Asia_qualifying_rounds) in April 2024. ## Honours **[National Basketball League (Singapore)](/wiki/National_Basketball_League_(Singapore))** - **Champions (2):** 2014, 2023, 2024 - Runners-up (2): 2018, 2022 ## Roster Adroit Club - 2024 BCL Asia qualifiers rosterPlayersCoachesPos.No.Nat.NameHt.Wt.-1Yao Tor, Lok[G](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Guards)5[Long Wong, Wei](/wiki/Wei_Long_Wong)1.75 m (5 ft 9 in)[C](/wiki/Center_(basketball))9Chan, Herman1.90 m (6 ft 3 in)[G](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Guards)10Han Wong, Zhong1.83 m (6 ft 0 in)[G](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Guards)11Hua Sen Liew, Larry1.91 m (6 ft 3 in)[F](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Forwards)12Wu, Qinde[G](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Guards)13Zhou, Zhenqiang1.77 m (5 ft 10 in)[F](/wiki/Basketball_positions#Forwards)17[Ng, Hanbin](/wiki/Hanbin_Ng)-55Moepo Kelly, Donald[C](/wiki/Center_(basketball))99Borhan, Naqib1.87 m (6 ft 2 in)Head coach - Chi Peng Pek Legend - **(C)** Team captain - **(I)** Import player - Injured - Roster Updated: 2024 - Official Instagram page This Singapore-related article is a stub.
